Installation (1st letter): A - Piloted Aircraft (includes parachutes and piloted balloons)
Type of Equipment (2nd letter): A - Invisible Light, Heat Radiation (e.g., infrared)
Miscellaneous: X, Y, Z for changes in voltage, frequency, or phase

Type of Equipment (2nd letter): B - Communications security (was Pigeon) (NSA use only)

Installation (1st letter): C - Cryptographic Equipment (was Air, Transportable) (NSA use only)

Type of Equipment (2nd letter): D - Radiac (Radioactivity Detection, Identification, and Computation)
Purpose (3rd letter): D - Direction Finder, Reconnaissance, and Surveillance

Type of Equipment (2nd letter): E - Laser (was NUPAC: Nuclear Protection & Control)

Miscellaneous: (- FT, - IN)       identical items with varying lengths

Purpose (3rd letter): G - Fire Control or Search Light Directing

Type of Equipment (2nd letter): J - Electromechanical or Inertial Wire Covered

Purpose (3rd letter): L - removed (was Searchlight Control, now covered by "G")
P - removed (was Reproducing, now covered by "H")
S - Detecting or Range and Bearing, Search

Installation (1st letter): W - Water Surface and Underwater combined   *
Purpose (3rd letter): W - Automatic Flight or Remote Control
Y - Surveillance (search, detect, and multiple target tracking) and Control (both fire control and/or air control)

Installation (1st letter): Z - Piloted and Pilotless Airborne Vehicles combined   *
